Large.description: Only use once per screen. Reserved for the highest emphasis content such as the amount on a purchase screen.

Medium.description: Use sparingly for high emphasis content.

Small.description: Use sparingly for high emphasis content.

Large.description: Use to describe interface chunks with multiple subunits.

Medium.description: Use to describe interface chunks with multiple subunits.

Small.description: Use to describe interface chunks with no subunits.

Large.description: Use for long-form content on desktop

Medium.description: Primary label font for mobile. Use sparingly on desktop.

Small.description: Primary label font for desktop. Use sparingly on mobile.

xSmall.description: Use for captions and short-form descriptions

xxSmall.description: Do not use outside of data visualization.
